presentation.title: Hello, I'm
presentation.description: +5 years of experience. Software Analysis and Development Technologist. Passionate about technology and design.

artekium.description_1: Currently working as a .NET Developer in an investment insurance application.
artekium.description_2: Development and maintenance of backend services with ASP.NET Core, Entity Framework Core and SQL Server.
artekium.description_3: Collaboration in the frontend using the latest versions of Angular.

urbetrack.description_1: Collaborated as a backend developer in a logistics and urban fleet management platform.
urbetrack.description_2: Migration of legacy code to microservices with Clean Architecture and focus on Domain Driven Design (DDD).
urbetrack.description_3: Critical bug fixing to maintain the system stable and performance improvement in key points.
urbetrack.description_4: Redesign of legacy modules to avoid circularity and spaghetti code, applying DDD and simplifying the code.

wenance.description_1: Collaborated as a backend engineer in the development of an online credit application. Applied technical improvements and unit tests in each development, to give more security to the system.

conexia.description_1: Project for health insurance with microservices — full-stack role.
conexia.description_2: Performance improvement and new features: query optimization, refactoring and adoption of Spring Batch for massive data processing.
conexia.description_3: Frontend: new views, style adjustments and bug fixing to improve the user experience.

avalith.description_1: Development of intranet with React (UI and reusable components).
avalith.description_2: Implementation of REST APIs and microservices for virtual wallet with .NET, Clean Architecture, CQRS, SQL and Kafka.
avalith.description_3: Creation of web-app for pawn shop, defining architecture, database and CI/CD pipelines in Azure, with React + .NET.

about.title: About me
about.paragraph_1: I am from Mar del Plata, Argentina. In 2018 I graduated as a Senior Programming Technician at the National Technological University (UTN).
about.paragraph_2: I have experience in the design and development of microservices following clean architectures and Domain-Driven Design (DDD) principles. I have built robust and scalable REST APIs, working with both relational (SQL Server, MySQL) and non-relational (MongoDB) databases.
about.paragraph_3: Additionally, I have experience in frontend development, creating attractive and functional user interfaces from mockups (UI/UX) and implementing reusable components in modern frameworks such as Angular and React. My approach is oriented towards building maintainable, scalable applications with a high-quality user experience.
